abstract: Jonathan M. Nelson of Providence Equity Partners and Reed Hastings, the chief executive of Netflix and a Facebook board member, are among the latest signatories to the Giving Pledge, joining a growing number of billionaires who plan to give away most of their wealth.

lead_paragraph: Businessmen like Jonathan M. Nelson and Reed Hastings normally focus on generating the maximum amount of profit from their work as possible. But the two men have joined Warren E. Buffett and Bill Gates in pledging to dole out most of their wealth to charity.

headline.main: Providence Equity’s Nelson and Netflix’s Hastings Join the Giving Pledge

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
